alert.note: Alert for Caddo; De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:53AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity for the following rivers in Louisiana... Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake affecting De Soto and Caddo Parishes. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake. * WHEN...Until late on Tuesday evening or very early on Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 152.0 feet, Expect overflow of some six secondary roadways in the southern Kingston Road area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 151.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CDT Saturday was 151.7 feet. - Forecast...The bayou will continue a slow rise and crest this Saturday evening at 7PM CDT at 152.0 feet and will drop below flood stage by late on Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 151.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 1200 PM CDT.
